body.name: TeqHome 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside, 1080P FHD Dash Camera for Cars, Three Way Triple Dashcam Car Camera Recorder with IR Night Vision, Loop Recording, WDR, 24H Parking Monitor, G-Sensor
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 20 mins
features: 【1080P Full HD 3 Channels Dash Cam】The front 1080P camera and adjustable inside-facing camera can record videos simultaneously, always keeping you informed of the road status ahead and the status of the rear car seat. Besides, the rear camera always keeps you informed of the road status behind you and protects you against backing into another car while parking. With a wide field of vision up to 140°, it can catch any vehicle at the sides of your car.

【Superior Night Vision Dash Camera】Adopting an excellent optical lens with an ultra-large F2.0 aperture, 6-glass layer, and infrared lighting, the dash camera for cars can still provide clear and sharp videos in relatively dark environments. It can serve as important evidence when a collision happens even at night. The function will auto-turn on at night, or you can also turn it on by pressing the button in the front of the dash cam during the day.

【Professional Motion Detection Car Camera】Are you tired of your neighbors scraping your car while parking theirs? This car dash cam starts recording automatically once it detects motion. Besides, those who want to break into your car will also be clearly recorded, better protecting your property. You’d better connect the camera to the car battery to ensure adequate power.

【Emergency Accident Lock & Parking Monitor】This dashboard camera is a built-in G-sensor, when sudden events such as a car collision or a sudden turn, can automatically record and store images, in order to provide evidence of the accident, videos will be locked & won't be overwritten. The parking monitor monitors your car's surroundings while parked, and record when detect moving objects, to save power and memory space for more useful videos.

【Seamless Looping Recording & 100% Satisfaction Guarantee】Our dash cam front and rear inside support max 32G MMC card. When the MMC card is full, the car dash camera will overwrite the oldest footage automatically and record the new files. In this way, you will always have access to the latest ones. We offer 3-YEAR WARRANTY including a professional after-sales team who respond 24/7 online. We are always here for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TeqHome 2024 New Upgraded 1080P FHD 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside 2023 Newest Dash cam recording with Super High Resolution 1080P@30fps Full HD Lens, providing outstanding image quality with a broader field of vision. 2 inch Super large IPS Display that can shows the real-time image.

3 Channel Dash Cam The dash cam records in 1080P +480P + 480P HD quality simultaneously, providing strong evidence in accident disputes.It is a 3-channel car dash cam offering 360° full protection. It has ultra wide-angle cameras for the front (130°), interior (85°), and rear (60°).

Super Night Vision Dashcam With Fill Light Thanks to f/2.0 big aperture & WDR (wide dynamic range) technology, the TeqHome car camera performs well in color precision and clarity whether day or night. 4 IR LED lights greatly enhance the image quality of the car.

Powerful Dash Cam with Multi-Functions Adopt upgraded sensor, 6 glass lens, F2.0 big aperture and real 130 degree wide field of view, the dash cam reduces the blind spots and captures more details, to reserve the real scene.

New Upgraded Features: 24 Hours Parking Mode This dashcam will auto-switch to parking mode while your car is parked. Collision detection can be triggered by impact or movement. Auto Save The Collision Footage Built-in Gravity-Shock Sensor, when the dash cam detects a collision or bump, the sensor will auto-lock the footage as evidence. Seamless Loop Recording Even when the SD card is full the dash cam will continue recording with its Loop Recording feature. Our dash camera for cars can support up to max 32G MMC card.

Safe & Waterproof Rear Camera The rear camera is IP65 waterproof and can function normally even in heavy rain. With simplified rear camera installation, no need to remove the reversing light. Super Easy Installation This dashcam is powered by the vehicle cigarette lighter And is simple to install and set up with excellent instructions included, there is no need to worry even for a first-time user. Safe & Mini Design With a slim and compact design (Size: 4.12x1.8x1.8in), the dashcam takes up tiny space in your car, which won't obstruct your vision while driving.

3 Channel Dash Cam WiFi GPS Dash Cam 3 Channel Dash Cam Touch Screen Dash Cam Camera Type Front+Inside+Rear dashcam Front + Rear Mini dashcam Front+Inside+Rear dashcam Front+Inside+Rear dashcam Screen Size 2.0" IPS Screen 3.0" IPS Screen 2.0" IPS Screen 4.0" Touch Screen Video Resolution 1080P +480P + 480P 1080P + 720P 1080P +480P + 480P 1296P +1080P + 720P Mounting Type Suction Mount Adhesive Mount Adhesive Mount Suction Mount SD Card Max Support 32G TF Card 128G TF Card 64G TF Card (32GB TF Card Included) 32G TF Card Rear Camera Waterproof Level IP65 IPX5 IP65 IPX6 WIFI & APP Control ✘ ✓ ✘ ✘ Built-in GPS ✘ ✓ ✘ ✘ Charging DC12V/24V, 2.5A DC12V/24V, 2.5A DC12V/24V, 2.5A DC12V/24V, 2.5A

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my sis and she hasn't had any complaints yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: You get what you pay for. This dashcam was a replacement for another I used for years but finally quit.The screen is small, and it will only show one of the other views (inside and rear). After less than a day, the rear camera view lost its contrast to where the display only shows bright lights, the rest of the view is gray.I'll be shopping for a better dashcam later, you get what you pay for with this one. Don't expect much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it work perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a DashCam
reviews.reviewText: Seems to be a pretty good dashcam. The casing is metal and so is the windshield mount. The included cables are plenty long enough and it even includes a rear camera (powered by hdmi cord from main camera unit). Camera quality seems to be pretty good, wide angle like most dash cams. I was able to hide the entire length of the cables on my install and put the dash cam behind my rearview mirror so that I can't see it when driving and it captures exactly what it needs to.The bad:-Power cables are MINI USB?! Seriously??? Its 2023, make it USB-C! Mini USB was released in 2000 for crying out loud!-There is a startup jingle that you can't mute or get rid of in any of the settings (I even asked the seller), you can only mute the menu navigation sounds.-Menu options and instruction manual seems like it was translated using Google Translate from Chinese to English.In all, I can live with the cons, it does what it says it does, and works.
